p: Using Mesodyn and also Matlab for comparison purposes, we tried to visualize the 3-dimensional morphology of the copolymer melt. While the well-known double diamond structure with Pn3m symmetry is expected to appear, Figure 7 portrays a totally new image of the morphology for the copolymer. Inside the cube, two triangular A-domains are connected with one of them rotated by 180 degrees to form a bicontinuous morphology. The B-domains then run through the triangular A-domains via three channels. The overall shape of the new morphology is considered to resemble the sacred Metatronâ€™s cube [ 42]. It is noted that the channels are connected with tetrapod units.
